projects.name: FinanceFlow Pro
projects.description: A comprehensive financial management platform for SMEs, featuring real-time reporting, automated invoicing, and integrated payment processing. The system processes over $50M in transactions monthly.

projects.name: HealthConnect Mobile
projects.description: Healthcare appointment booking and telemedicine platform connecting patients with healthcare providers. Features video consultations, prescription management, and health records access.

projects.name: RetailHub Analytics
projects.description: Advanced analytics dashboard for retail chains providing real-time insights into sales, inventory, and customer behavior across multiple locations with predictive analytics capabilities.

projects.name: EduLearn Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive e-learning management system with interactive courses, live classes, assignment tracking, and progress analytics for educational institutions and corporate training.

projects.name: LogisticsTrack Pro
projects.description: End-to-end logistics management solution with real-time tracking, route optimization, warehouse management, and automated dispatch scheduling for delivery companies.

projects.name: PropertyView Portal
projects.description: Real estate marketplace with virtual tours, AI-powered property recommendations, mortgage calculators, and integrated CRM for agents managing listings and client relationships.

projects.name: FoodieDelivery App
projects.description: Multi-vendor food delivery platform with real-time order tracking, AI-based restaurant recommendations, loyalty programs, and integrated payment gateway serving 100K+ users.

projects.name: ManufactureIQ System
projects.description: Smart manufacturing execution system with IoT integration, real-time production monitoring, quality control automation, and predictive maintenance capabilities.

projects.name: HRConnect Suite
projects.description: All-in-one HR management system with recruitment, onboarding, performance management, payroll processing, and employee self-service portal for mid-size enterprises.
